mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (id , name, create_time, update_time, del) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{del})
mapper.delete: update tb_user set del=1 where id=#{id} limit 1;
mapper.select: select * from tb_user where id=#{id} and del=0
select count(*) from tb_user where del=0
select * from tb_user where del=0 limit #{start}, #{limit}
